mention.text: a relic of the uneasy armistice that ended the Korean War six decades ago and has led to a permanent U.S. troop presence on the peninsula ever since -LRB- some 28,500 soldiers -RRB-
the event of conflict breaking out
a permanent U.S. troop presence on the peninsula
the conservatives currently in power in Seoul
